channel.title: Journal, notes, and blog
channel.description: Recent content on Journal, notes, and blog

item.description: About this blog This is where I collect my general thoughts on programming, languages, tools, and frameworks. But mostly, it is where I explore the development of my toy-language ∨∑ (orsum). About SKSG I am a schooled engineer in physics and nanotechnology. I have pursued an academic carreer in nanoelectronics and later computer vision (see Google scholar). Now, however, I am employed as a medical imaging systems engineer. I consider myself a more-than-a-hobbyist programmer with many unfinished projects (see my random code at Github).
